results.content: This isn't a deep dive of the .NET framework as much as it is a scam. Basic, surface-level lectures on concepts like data structures, Async code, EF, etc. that you can find in a more efficient way on Google.
results.content_html: This isn't a deep dive of the .NET framework as much as it is a scam. Basic, surface-level lectures on concepts like data structures, Async code, EF, etc. that you can find in a more efficient way on Google.

results.content:
I really liked this course because it addresses issues that developers often overlook.
This kind of details are what can differentiate a professional programmer from an amateur.
I learned a lot of new things in this course, so I highly recommend it to all .Net developers

results.content: Crisp and to the point, this is a great course to introspect about how we implement certain things as we code, and where we do mistakes v/s where we do it right.
results.content_html: Crisp and to the point, this is a great course to introspect about how we implement certain things as we code, and where we do mistakes v/s where we do it right.

results.content:
Im Großen und Ganzen hat mir der Kurs viele Hinweise gegeben wie ich meinen Code verbessern kann. 
Ich hätte den Kurs noch besser bewertet wenn es mehr Beispiele gegeben hätte um die Dinge nachzuvollziehen.
results.content_html:

results.content: Very useful course for any mid or senior level developer. Would like to see more in-depth on some specific issues (of course there are many) and not all can be covered.

results.content: A perfect course, the more I watch it, the more expert I have become.
